Serialized Form

Package com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncControl implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

parentsFirst

int parentsFirst
Parent entries are returned before their children when value is set to 1.
 

maxReturnLength

int maxReturnLength
The maximum length (in bytes) to be returned in a control response. Must be greater than zero for any data to be returned.
 

cookie

byte[] cookie
A server-generated cookie.
 

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncResponseControl implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

flag

int flag
If flag is set to a non-zero value, it implies that there is more data to retrieve.
 

maxReturnLength

int maxReturnLength
The maximum length (in bytes) returned in a control response.
 

cookie

byte[] cookie
A server-generated cookie.

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.TreeDeleteControl implements Serializable

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.VirtualListViewControl implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

beforeCount

int beforeCount
The number of entries before the target entry in a sublist.
 

afterCount

int afterCount
The number of entries after the target entry in a sublist.
 

targetOffset

int targetOffset
An offset into the list.
 

listSize

int listSize
An estimate of the number of entries in the list.
 

targetAttrValue

java.lang.Object targetAttrValue
Attribute value used to locate the target entry. This value is compared to values of the attribute specified as the primary sort key. Only String and byte[] values are currently supported.
 

cookie

byte[] cookie
A server-generated cookie.
 

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.VirtualListViewResponseControl implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

targetOffset

int targetOffset
The position of the target entry in the list.
 

listSize

int listSize
The current number of entries in the list.
 

resultCode

int resultCode
The result code of the view operation.
 

cookie

byte[] cookie
A server-generated cookie.

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.EntryChangeResponseControl implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

changeType

int changeType
The type of change that occurred.
 

previousDN

java.lang.String previousDN
The previous distinguished name (only applies to RENAME changes).
 

changeNumber

long changeNumber
The change number (if supported by the server).
 

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ManageReferralControl implements Serializable

Class com.sun.jndi.ldap.PersistentSearchControl implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

changeTypes

int changeTypes
The change types of interest. All changes, by default.
 

changesOnly

boolean changesOnly
Return original entries and changed entries or only changed entries.
 

returnControls

boolean returnControls
Return entry change controls.
